directions: Lightly combine the avocados with red wine vinegar in a salad bowl. Stir in the black beans, corn, tomatoes, green onions, and red onion.
Whisk together the olive oil and Italian dressing mix in a bowl, pour over the salad, and toss lightly.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1/4 cup olive oil, or as needed
1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
title: Aztec Salsa
